message: "If I could wave a magic wand and change one thing about trafficking, it would be the public perception of what trafficking is," Ferjak told a crowd of more than 100 at the Fellowship Community Church. "Most people think about prostitution when you say human trafficking. I'm here to tell you in a very clear and definite way they are not the same thing.  "We need to stop talking about prostitutes and start talking about prostituted people."

data.description: A warm body is worth $300,000 a year, one Iowa human trafficking expert estimates.
data.title: Human trafficking victims live 'out where we can see them' expert says
